I am disgusted by President Trump’s racist social media post. It’s another symptom of his chaotic and dangerous presidency.
https://t.co/PlXAdpDugF
As #MilanCortina26 Winter @Olympics gets underway, sending special shoutout to all the RIers representing & supporting #TeamUSA! https://t.co/HphIV8kXyZ

Trump’s immigration chaos needs to end. ICE must stop claiming powers it doesn’t have under law or the Constitution. 

Dems are standing up to rein in ICE with real accountability & reforms. Republicans must join us.

We have an opportunity to expand opportunity… and to modernize public schools, create good jobs, & grow the economy while we’re at it. Teamed up w/ @BobbyScott to intro Rebuild America’s Schools Act to free up more fed funds to help states & communities build & improve schools. https://t.co/Alrt8JUTlL

Trump’s reckless policies are increasing prices & causing economic drag. Instead of taking steps to address affordability he is:
 
A. Posting racist tropes
B. Investigating The View
C. Halting critical infrastructure projects unless cities rename things after him
✅D. All of the

70 new homes now available in the heart of downtown Woonsocket thanks to significant fed investments I helped deliver. @NeighborWorks Blackstone River Valley’s innovative vision here reimagined historic mills into welcoming homes for low- & mid-income RIers. https://t.co/yK9VTKcg8I
Thank you @patriots for an amazing season! Perhaps the greatest 'rebuild year' in NFL history. The loss hurts, but the Pats future is bright!
